name: Blood Debt
description:
Blood Debt 
Ludum Dare #44: Your life is currency

In this retro zelda-like/shooting game, your adventure may be easier if you borrow some health points. But don't forget that every loan comes with a debt...

Controls

Use W/A/S/D to move
Use arrows to shoot

Tools used 

code: Typescript, pixiJS, parcel-bundler 
pixel-art: Piskel
music and sounds: Garage Band / bfxr
